title: Normals power
body: So, I don't like ranked and all that as I don't like the pressure/serious part of it. So I play a lot of normal (Basically only thing I play) and I'm so sick of the people who join late, call their favourite roll and insta lock. 95% of the time, the guy who has already called top before the late-joiner isn't  going to change. The guy who joined late has already locked in the Master Yi top saying he's the best Yi Oce, and I don't enjoy going into games knowing that someone is arguing before the game has even begun. I hope that this new champ select in S6 will help this, because I'm getting dodging bans daily because I don't want to go into a game with 2 top laners and the ADC is alone bot because these kids won't work out something. It's so unfair and if it's done to someone who isn't very viable with other roles, it'll cause a huge argument. There should be a way to report people in champ select or something because if someone dodges I can't report them for trolling, unless I get into another game with them and no one dodges to these inconsiderate kids who don't care about the other players. It seems like no one in Normals can be a decent human being for the 20-45 minutes they'll need to spend with each other. There should be a section in the reporting system for 'Champ select troll'. I guess that kind of comes down in griefing but it's not specific enough. I've been searching for a Normals game for like 20 minutes now because everyone keeps locking roles they didn't call first. Please Rito, add something that can detect and remove these champ select trolls because you can't stop them, asking them nicely wont help because they're selfish. The only way to have a normal game with one of these kids is for asking the guy who called first to swap, which 90% of the time they wont do because they didn't call top to be placed in support because of a troll. Draft mode in normal could also fix this, but I guess people may still pick the role they want and make the excuse "it's just normal bro"

replies.body: First normal I played in age two people fight over mid the games starts zeds now the adc , get to top to find out there's a duo top then our jungler goes afk and I was like  Back to ranked I go

The real solution is Draft Pick Normals. We have been asking for this, for as long as the OCE server itself. No real word from Riot yet. 

We are one of the few servers who still do not have this. Riot will be forced to implement it during the new champion select beta, but I wonder if it will stay past the beta stage.
OCE doesn't have Normal Draft? Wow, that's horrible...
It's a hard life :( Ahaha I honestly just want to practice counter picks and ban OP champions.

I was in a ranked game the other day where I locked in rengar jungle as it was my turn to pick but the guy below me in the picking order just goes ahead and locks in udyr with smite saying "duo jg op". No matter what queue you go into the champ select trolls will always be there :/
thats what we need! draft in oce for normals i agree with everything u are saying.. i dont play ranked either so normals is all i play
